overview:
Gary Friedman is the CEO of Restoration Hardware.

Gary Friedman is Chairman and Co-Chief Executive Officer of Restoration Hardware, Inc., a San Francisco-based retailer of fine home furnishings and hardware.

From 1988 to 2001, Mr. Friedman was a senior executive at Williams-Sonoma, Inc., serving as President and Chief Operating Officer from May 2000 to March 2001; as Chief Merchandising Officer and President of Retail Stores from 1995 to 2000; and as Executive Vice President and President of the Williams-Sonoma and Pottery Barn brands from 1993 to 1995. Prior to joining Williams-Sonoma, Mr. Friedman spent eleven years with The Gap, Inc. in various management positions.

In addition to his role of CEO, Mr. Friedman also serves Restoration Hardware as design director. In this role he has revamped the company twice. Noted for his tenure and expertise in retail and merchandising, he coined the phrase, “great brands don’t chase customers, customers chase great brands.”
